title: KERRY KING Announces Headlining Shows Around European Festival Dates
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 3 hours ago
text: Kerry King is slated for a handful of major European festivals this summer like the Brutal Assault Festival, Motocultor, and Dynamo Festival. King has now announced a handful of headlining tour dates between all those festivals, all of which you can find below. Get your tickets here. 7/29 Zoom Saal Frankfurt, DE7/30 Simm City Wien, AU8/1 Rockstadt Extreme Transylvania, RO8/4 Komplex 457 Zürich, CH8/6-9 Brutal Assault Festival Jaromer, CZ8/7 FZW Dortmund, DE8/8-10 Alcatraz Festival Kortrijk, BE8/12 Academy 2 Manchester, UK8/13 SWX Bristol, UK8/14-17 Motocultor Festival Carhaix, FR8/17 Dynamo Festival Eindhoven, NL8/19 Tauron Arena Krakow, PL (supporting Gojira) Prior to that, King will hit the road in North America with Municipal Waste and Alien Weaponry as support. Get your tickets here. 1/15 The Regency Ballroom, San Francisco, CA1/17 Spokane Live Casino, Spokane, WA1/18 Showbox SoDo, Seattle, WA1/19 Roseland Theater, Portland, OR1/20 Commodore Ballroom, Vancouver, BC1/22 The Palace Theatre, Calgary, AB1/23 Midway Music Hall, Edmonton, AB1/25 Burton Cummings Theatre, Winnipeg, MB1/26 The Fillmore, Minneapolis, MN1/28 The Rave, Milwaukee, WI1/30 The Majestic Theater, Detroit, MI1/31 House of Blues, Cleveland, OH2/1 Danforth Music Hall, Toronto, ON2/2 L'Olympia, Montreal, QC2/4 Royale, Boston, MA2/5 Theatre of the Living Arts, Philadelphia, PA2/7 Irving Plaza, New York, NY2/8 Baltimore Soundstage, Baltimore, MD2/10 Buckhead Theatre, Atlanta, GA2/11 Jannus Live, St. Petersburg, FL2/13 House of Blues, Houston, TX2/14 Emo's, Austin, TX2/15 The Studio at the Factory, Dallas, TX2/17 Ogden Theatre, Denver, CO2/18 Sunshine Theater, Albuquerque, NM2/19 The Nile Theater, Phoenix, AZ2/21 House of Blues, Las Vegas, NV2/22 The Fonda Theatre, Los Angeles, CA Want More Metal? html:
Kerry King is slated for a handful of major European festivals this summer like the Brutal Assault Festival, Motocultor, and Dynamo Festival. King has now announced a handful of headlining tour dates between all those festivals, all of which you can find below. Get your tickets here.

7/29 Zoom Saal Frankfurt, DE
7/30 Simm City Wien, AU
8/1 Rockstadt Extreme Transylvania, RO
8/4 Komplex 457 Zürich, CH
8/6-9 Brutal Assault Festival Jaromer, CZ
8/7 FZW Dortmund, DE
8/8-10 Alcatraz Festival Kortrijk, BE
8/12 Academy 2 Manchester, UK
8/13 SWX Bristol, UK
8/14-17 Motocultor Festival Carhaix, FR
8/17 Dynamo Festival Eindhoven, NL
8/19 Tauron Arena Krakow, PL (supporting Gojira)

Prior to that, King will hit the road in North America with Municipal Waste and Alien Weaponry as support. Get your tickets here.

1/15 The Regency Ballroom, San Francisco, CA
1/17 Spokane Live Casino, Spokane, WA
1/18 Showbox SoDo, Seattle, WA
1/19 Roseland Theater, Portland, OR
1/20 Commodore Ballroom, Vancouver, BC
1/22 The Palace Theatre, Calgary, AB

1/28 The Rave, Milwaukee, WI

1/31 House of Blues, Cleveland, OH

2/21 House of Blues, Las Vegas, NV
2/22 The Fonda Theatre, Los Angeles, CA
